scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/backend && npm run build -w apps/frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w apps/backend && npm run lint -w apps/frontend && npm run lint -w packages/shared
scripts.test: npm run test -w packages/shared && npm run test -w apps/backend && npm run test -w apps/frontend
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit -w packages/shared && npm run test:unit -w apps/backend && npm run test:unit -w apps/frontend
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration -w apps/backend && npm run test:integration -w apps/frontend
